definition: lit. spider's thread and horse track/tiny hints (of a secret)/traces/clue
(bird species of China) streaked spiderhunter (Arachnothera magna)
Spider-Man, see 蜘蛛俠|蜘蛛侠/nickname of French skyscraper climber Alain Robert (1962-)/person who scales the outer walls of a building as a stunt or for building maintenance

sentences.english: The postembryonic development and fecundity of P. piraticus were investigated at 6 constant temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 報道了溫度對真水狼蛛發育和繁殖的影響。

sentences.english: The black widow and brown recluse are both venomous spiders.
sentences.chinese: 黑寡婦球腹蛛和褐皮花蛛都是有毒蜘蛛。

sentences.english: The black widow and brown recluse are both venomous spiders.
sentences.chinese: 黑寡婦球腹蛛和褐皮花蛛都是有毒蜘蛛。

sentences.english: The population dynamics of Pardosa T-insignita in cotton fields were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了丁紋豹蛛種羣消長動態。

sentences.english: Overwintering anti early rearing of Latrodectus tredecimguttatus baby spiders is the key of artificially rearing the spiders.
sentences.chinese: 間斑寇蛛幼蛛過冬和早期飼養管理是人工飼養的關鍵。

sentences.english: Tarantulas boast an eight-pack for all-round vision.
sentences.chinese: 狼蛛有八隻眼睛，全方位的視野。

sentences.english: Solifuges are divided into two groups - nocturnal and diurnal.
sentences.chinese: 避日蛛大體能分爲兩種生活方式，夜行和晝夜行。

sentences.english: Deinopids are large to very large spiders that build highly modified orb webs (Coddington, 1986b).
sentences.chinese: 妖面蛛爲大型到較大型蜘蛛，建造高度特化的圓網。

sentences.english: In addition, all tarantulas are venomous and have the ability to bite.
sentences.chinese: 此外，所有捕鳥蛛是有毒的，並有咬傷能力的。

sentences.english: The major dominant species of insect pests were Prodenia litura and Lipaphis erysimi.
sentences.chinese: 捕食性天敵主要優勢種爲八斑球腹蛛和草間小黑蛛。

sentences.english: Solifuges live for about a year and pass through 9 instars before maturity.
sentences.chinese: 避日蛛的壽命大約有一年，9齡之前壽命終結。

sentences.english: We need an antitoxin to counteract the bite of the tarantula.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要抗毒素來解被狼蛛咬後產生的毒。

sentences.english: Golden Nephila spider has found a katydid in her web.
sentences.chinese: 金疣蛛發現網上有一支紡織娘。

sentences.english: Peduncles with sparse arachnoid tomentum when young, then gradually falling off.
sentences.chinese: 幼時的花序梗具具稀疏蛛絲狀毛，然後逐漸從上落下。

sentences.english: Male nursery web spiders often woo potential lady-friends with gifts wrapped in silk.
sentences.chinese: 雄性保育蛛通常用絲裹的禮物像潛在的對象求愛。

sentences.english: These blankets are made up of gossamer threads spun by juvenile money spiders as they make the big step of leaving home.
sentences.chinese: 這些織物是華蓋蛛幼蛛爲了離開家由蛛絲製造的。

definition: a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
arch. legendary venomous insect/to poison/to bewitch/to drive to insanity/to harm by witchcraft/intestinal parasite
